sourcesContent:
import { useRouter } from 'next/router'
import Query from '../../components/utils/query'
import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown'
import Moment from 'react-moment'
import ARTICLE_QUERY from '../../apollo/queries/article'
import {ArticlePage, Header, Content} from './article_styled.js'

const Article = () => {
	const router = useRouter()

	return (
		<Query query={ARTICLE_QUERY} id={router.query.id}>
			{({ data: { article } }) => (
					<ArticlePage>
						<Header>
							{article.title}
							<small>
								<Moment format="Do MMM YYYY">{article.published_at}</Moment>
							</small>
						</Header>
						<Content>
						<ReactMarkdown source={article.content} />
						</Content>
					</ArticlePage>
				)
			}
		</Query>
	)
}

export default Article
